fractions.name: JPA EclipseLink
fractions.description: Java Persistence API with EclipseLink

fractions.name: Camel Core
fractions.description:
Java Integration Framework implementing the Enterprise Integration Patterns, doing the mediation and routing of the messages using a DSL Language (Java, Spring XML or Blueprint XML). This core module
    contains the logic to support the different patterns, many languages (Simple, constant, header, body) to manipulate the content & expressions to take decisions during the routing.

fractions.description: Cassandra integration

fractions.name: Batch
fractions.description: Java EE Batch with JBeret

fractions.name: AsciidoctorJ
fractions.description: AsciidoctorJ is the official library for running Asciidoctor on the JVM. Using AsciidoctorJ, you can convert AsciiDoc content or analyze the structure of a parsed AsciiDoc document from Java and other JVM languages.

fractions.name: Camel Core
fractions.description:
Java Integration Framework implementing the Enterprise Integration Patterns, doing the mediation and routing of the messages using a DSL Language (Java, Spring XML or Blueprint XML). This core module
    contains the logic to support the different patterns, many languages (Simple, constant, header, body) to manipulate the content & expressions to take decisions during the routing.

fractions.name: Camel Core
fractions.description:
Java Integration Framework implementing the Enterprise Integration Patterns, doing the mediation and routing of the messages using a DSL Language (Java, Spring XML or Blueprint XML). This core module
    contains the logic to support the different patterns, many languages (Simple, constant, header, body) to manipulate the content & expressions to take decisions during the routing.
